Name: Leidy Johana
description:
Leidy Johana is a young farmer from Caldono, Cauca with more than 14 years of experience learned directly from her family. She currently owns a one-hectare plot terrain where she distributes 4,000 coffee trees along with cassava sprouts. Leidy sells her crops to Colombia’s Coffee Growers’ Federation. During harvest time, Leidy works with four people from her community who support her in the collection and distribution of both crops.

Leidy is a single mother living in her parents' home with her one-year-old son. Her parents are also farmers who support her in maintaining the crops.

A loan of 2,293,651 COP helps Leidy to purchase organic fertilizers that will increase her crops' production for the year’s final harvest.
